siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门

siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's revealing interview with Oprah Winfrey outlined their motivations for breaking from the Royal Family, including Meghan’s suicidal thoughts. 

Watch The National live on YouTube Sunday-Friday at 9 p.m. ET

Subscribe to The National: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/CBCTheNational?sub_confirmation=1

More from CBC News | https://www.cbc.ca/news

The National is CBC's flagship nightly news program, featuring the day's top stories with in-depth and original journalism, with hosts Adrienne Arsenault and Andrew Chang in Toronto, Ian Hanomansing in Vancouver and the CBC's chief political correspondent, Rosemary Barton in Ottawa.

localize.title: 哈里王子和梅根在接受奥普拉采访时透露了王室裂痕背后的斗争。
哈里王子和梅根在接受奧普拉採訪時透露了王室裂痕背後的鬥爭。

previous.excerpt:
The British royal family is bracing itself for a highly anticipated interview between Prince Harry, his wife Meghan Markle and Oprah Winfrey. 

In a clip that was released earlier, Meghan accuses the royals of perpetuating falsehoods about the couple. Just as that happened, the Palace said it was investigating bullying claims levelled against the duchess by former staffers. 

The couple stepped down as working royals to pursue a new life in the United States last year.

Al Jazeera's Neave Barker reports from London, UK.

- Subscribe to our channel: http://aje.io/AJSubscribe 
- Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AJEnglish 
- Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aljazeera 
- Check our website: https://www.aljazeera.com/

#UK
previous.title: UK braces for Oprah interview with Prince Harry and wife Meghan

localize.title: 英国为奥普拉采访哈里王子和妻子梅根做准备
localize.description:
英国王室正在为哈里王子、他的妻子梅根-马克尔和奥普拉-温弗瑞之间备受期待的采访做准备。

在早前发布的一段视频中，梅根指责王室成员对这对夫妇的错误言论长期存在。就在这时，皇宫表示正在调查前工作人员对公爵夫人提出的欺凌指控。

这对夫妇去年辞去了工作王室的职务，在美国追求新的生活。

半岛电视台的Neave Barker在英国伦敦报道。

- 订阅我们的频道：http://aje.io/AJSubscribe 
- 在Twitter上关注我们：https://twitter.com/AJEnglish 
- 在Facebook上找到我们：https://www.facebook.com/aljazeera 
- 查看我们的网站：https://www.aljazeera.com/

#英国

localize.title: 英國爲奧普拉採訪哈里王子和妻子梅根做準備
localize.description:
英國王室正在爲哈里王子、他的妻子梅根-馬克爾和奧普拉-溫弗瑞之間備受期待的採訪做準備。

在早前發佈的一段視頻中，梅根指責王室成員對這對夫婦的錯誤言論長期存在。就在這時，皇宮表示正在調查前工作人員對公爵夫人提出的欺凌指控。

這對夫婦去年辭去了工作王室的職務，在美國追求新的生活。

半島電視臺的Neave Barker在英國倫敦報道。

- 訂閱我們的頻道：http://aje.io/AJSubscribe 
- 在Twitter上關注我們：https://twitter.com/AJEnglish 
- 在Facebook上找到我們：https://www.facebook.com/aljazeera 
- 查看我們的網站：https://www.aljazeera.com/

#英國

next.excerpt: Meghan Markle is setting the record straight. The former “Suits” star spoke with Oprah Winfrey during a bombshell tell-all on CBS, where she addressed a past rumor that she made Kate Middleton cry prior to her wedding to Prince Harry. She said the situation was actually the opposite, and that it was actually Kate who made her cry and that her sister-in-law ended up apologizing.
next.title: Meghan Markle Says Kate Middleton Made Her Cry Before Wedding

localize.title: 梅根-马克尔说凯特-米德尔顿在婚礼前让她哭了。
梅根-馬克爾說凱特-米德爾頓在婚禮前讓她哭了。
